charc - Variable in class dkeep.logic.Hero
 
checkCaughtByGuard() - Method in class dkeep.logic.GameState
Calls checkIfCaught and updates the game state if the hero was caught by the guard
checkCaughtByOgres() - Method in class dkeep.logic.GameState
Calls checkIfCaught and updates the game state if the hero was killed by any ogre
checkEvents() - Method in class dkeep.logic.GameState
Calls checkCaughtByGuard and checkCaughtByOgres to update the game state
checkHeroExit(char) - Method in class dkeep.logic.GameState
Checks if the hero moved onto a door and has the conditions to exit
checkIfCatchClub(Club, char) - Method in class dkeep.logic.Hero
Calls catchClub to check if the hero will catch his club if he moves in the given direction
checkIfCaught(int, int) - Method in class dkeep.logic.Hero
Checks if the hero is in the given position
checkObstacle(GameElement, char, char) - Method in class dkeep.logic.GameState
Given a GameElement's current position, checks if it is going to encounter the given obstacle (identified by its representative char) if it engages in a particular direction
checkObstacle(GameElement, GameElement, char) - Method in class dkeep.logic.GameState
Same as the other overload of checkObstacle but this time the obstacle itself is passed as an argument
